name: Extreme Dishwashing
description:
Do you find dishwashing boring? Try it with big guns!

Washing dishes can be a boring task, but not anymore…
Shoot the dirty glasses, cups and other plates with awesome weapons!

Only a fool would wash pans with soap. Grab a gun and destroy every dirty dishes!
But be careful, if you shoot clean plates, you lose.

From the team which brought to the world Extreme Gardening, discover a brand new challenge.
Extreme Dishwashing features:

Five awesome weapons to destroy everything
A cute and badass character
An endless hardcore challenge
Leaderboards to compare to your friends

Extreme Dishwashing is free so you can share it with the entire planet!
